title: Juan de Flandes: Joanna of Castile, Philip the Handsome; ca. 1500
description: Canon EOS R6 Mark II, Sigma 50/1.4 DG HSM(A), processed in Lightroom. Kunsthistorisches Museum Wien. Wikipedia: "Juan de Flandes ("John of Flanders"; c. 1460 ‚Äì by 1519) was a Flemish painter active in Spain from 1496 to 1519." Wikipedia: "Joanna (6 November 1479 ‚Äì 12 April 1555), historically known as Joanna the Mad (Spanish: Juana la Loca), was the nominal queen of Castile from 1504 and queen of Aragon from 1516 to her death in 1555. She was the daughter of Queen Isabella I of Castile and King Ferdinand II of Aragon. Joanna was married by arrangement to the Austrian archduke Philip the Handsome on 20 October 1496" Wikipedia: "Philip the Handsome (22 July 1478 ‚Äì 25 September 1506), also called the Fair, was ruler of the Burgundian Netherlands and titular Duke of Burgundy from 1482 to 1506, as well as the first Habsburg King of Castile (as Philip I) for a brief time in 1506. The son of Maximilian of Austria (later Holy Roman Emperor as Maximilian I) and Mary of Burgundy, Philip was not yet four years old when his mother died as a result of a riding accident, and upon her death, he inherited the Burgundian Netherlands. Despite his young age, Philip quickly proved himself an effective ruler beloved by his people in the Low Countries, pursuing policies that favored peace and economic development, while maintaining a steady course of the government building." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juan_de_Flandes en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joanna_of_Castile en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philip_I_of_Castile de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kunsthistorisches_Museum_Wien en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kunsthistorisches_Museum www.geschichtewiki.wien.gv.at/Kunsthistorisches_Museum

The Central Cemetery church of St. Karl Borrom√§us is a beautiful example of Art Nouveau architecture in Vienna.

title: The House of Muses
description: The Medallion House or House of Muses (Musenhaus) is an apartment building in the Art Nouveau style characteristic of the Vienna Secession, built by the architect Otto Wagner in 1898. The notable golden decoration is made up of medallions of muses and laurel garlands topped with golden palm leaves. Explore - January 8, 2024

title: My feet an a pavement in Vienna with my hated (because it gave the wrong impression about me) desigual coat and my pimped shoes in a town I was deeply in love with and still is
description:
self-portrait of my lower part of my body 15 years ago in Vienna (taken by the upper part of me) 

I don¬¥t know if anyone notice, but I don¬¥t feel as well as I used to do...

I had a few years when medication pushed away my depression but now again the angst-tentacles are reaching my heart and brain...

why? you might wonder why!!!

well I don¬¥t know if it is the only reason, but I really fear what is happening in the world and the consequences it might bring...

I am very afraid for our future, not only because of the climate changes, those are bad enough, but also the authoritarian trend in the in the world...

States being kidnapped by strong men who to cement their power by dismembering the systems that is securing democracy in the world...

That is making media and courts their tools, while the make their power more impossible to challenge...

...I just don¬¥t understand why people want strong leaders?

Yes I admit I am a Democrat (not in the American sense)

I believe in a state where different people can live side by side without aggression, where minorities and people of different political orientation need not be afraid of persecution...

...I don¬¥t this democracy is a perfect system, there is lot of things that is pretty bad in those system, but still it is so much better than the alternative...

Right now loads of parties in the western world and elsewhere that want to raise the fundaments of the "state for all" often because many people don¬¥t vote,  so that parties with an antidemocratic, authoritarian or nationalistic agenda often with a "we against them" agenda 

they do this often by telling that their opponents are corrupt and yes, many politicians in "democratic parties" are corrupt, 
...but believe me, those who claim to be uncorrupted are so too, quite often, totally, often not caring for others than the "strong leader" and his (or her) cronies...

I see a future, where minorities no longer are important, which scares me, where speech will (at a short or long term) will be eroded and completely taken away...

...there are states in the world, where journalist no longer dear to scrutinise their leaders and people in elevated positions, there a places in the world where you no longer can hold a blank piece of paper in public without law enforcement arresting them....

...there are places that once where democratic where people could speak freely where there is no longer this possibility...

this is why I ask all to vote and before they vote, question themselves will the leader I elect bring my state in to a less democratic state, with less press freedom with a juridical systems independence pulled so they sit in the lap of the "strong man" and his (or her) allies!!!

I write this now, in a time where I where I live still can express this, tomorrow it might be to late or I will be too scared...

I reach out to all who believe in democracy and want to live in free state! PLEASE VOTE! register, activate your self or talk, do something to repel these "fake democrats!" who are just waiting to tear down the system where a government can be brought down by popular vote...

I want to live in a world where all types can live the way they want, by mutual respect between political opponents, minorities and personalities...

I want the "truly democratic parties" to collaborate across political lines of left and right as long as they don¬¥t want to tear down these state institutions...

What I mean is that Democratic-left, democratic-right, democratic mid-parties have more in common when it comes to build carry on developing a democratic society for all of us...

Scrutinise the parties, that want us to slowly (so we wont notice until it is too late) slide towards a less democratic state...

But also, in parties of a democratic spectre oust all corrupt party members, get rid of those who are in it "just for money or power" those who really has no other ideology other than "Money and/or Power" these men and woman make their parties a disfavour...

I am frail, sadly, I just wish for enjoying life in Vienna, sitting on a Caf√© Draw in My sketchpad and listen to people talk around me... 

Please save democracy for us all, for the future generations!

PLEASE Don¬¥t gamble with Democracy!
in the end it will cost us a lot....

...and I just want to sit on caf√©s listen to people talk, think and bye somewhat happy...

I don¬¥t know for how much longer I will have power before I drift away in to angst again...

now I will try to focus on art for a while! that is my drug at the moment...!!!

Peace, democracy and Noise!

/ MushroomBrain one who believes in freedom for people!!!
